DOC.brief_summary: Introduction Aim : Desflurane sevoflurane frequently use maintenance anesthesia study show anesthetic cause variety change oxidative stress antioxidative defense mechanism . The chemical structure propofol similar free radical consumer endogenous vitamin E butylate hydroxene toluene . This study aim compare effect sevoflurane , desflurane propofol infusion anesthesia oxidant antioxidant system patient undergo laparoscopic cholecystectomy . Material Method : Forty-five patient , ASA ( American Society Anesthesiologists ) I-II , score 18-50 year plan laparoscopic cholecystectomy general anesthesia include study . Patients divide 3 group total intravenous anesthesia ( TIVA ) ( group T n : 15 ) , sevoflurane ( group S n : 15 ) desflurane ( group D n : 15 ) . Propofol 2 mg/kg IV , fentanyl 1 mcg/kg IV , vecuronium 0.1 mg/kg IV give group anesthesia induction . For maintenance anesthesia group S ventilate 2 % sevoflurane , 50 % air 50 % O2 mix 6 L/min flow . Group D give 6 % desflurane 50 % air 50 % O2 mix 6 L/min flow . Group T give propofol infusion 12 mg/kg/hr first 10 minute , 9 mg/kg/hr second 10 minute 6 mg/kg/hr . Patients ventilate 50 % air 50 % O2 mix 6 L/min flow . Before induction operation venous blood sample take evaluate level glutathion peroxidase , total oxidant antioxidant .
DOC.criteria: ASA III patient Between 1850 year Planned laparoscopic cholecystectomy general anesthetic Patients endocrine dysfunction blood transfusion previous 2 week sign infection inflammation history preoperative medication use anemia hemorrhage require transfusion operation exclude study .
